planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.

b. Move toward closest goal.
· If you would stop at a navpoint and passed through a planet no more than 2 spaces away, return to that planet.
· Do not stop on Maelstrom.
action: If at cargo destination, deliver it. If cargo is illegal character suffers 2 damage.
Buy a job card and place a goal token on card's destination.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Spend credits 8 000 to gain 1 fame.
c. Gain credits 4 000. Then lose 1 reputation with the faction of the nearest patrol.
